name: Daugger
description:
Daugger is an 8-bit adventure about a dog named Olive exploring & using her snoot to sniff out information, and peeing on every piece of ground she can.

Solve problems in different types of neighborhood. Use scent to read messages left by other dogs. Maybe even be a little stinker and cause some trouble now and then. Battle over grassy lots with Prince Crimson. Scour dusty desert for signs of life. Seek out solutions to other dogs' conundrums.

This top-down adventure features an amazing original chip-tune soundtrack of beautiful melodies. You may be tempted to put scrounging around on the back burner, and just listen.

Daugger features no combat, damage, or death. It's a relaxing game that can be enjoyed at any age. Reading is not required, but does enhance the experience.

Enjoy this love letter to pets everywhere.
